# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.inFrameBackgroundStem

**Case**

Isolates the ambience and foreground that is out of frame and place it in a spatial stem. There is no voice stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case inFrameBackgroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.inFrameBackgroundStem
